name: MxH Beat - Demo
description:
Karen, a recent high-school graduate, moves in with a family friend over summer...and find that she's moved into a neighborhood with some pretty cute monster-people. There's Noel, the tentacle-slime who works at the bed and breakfast you're staying in; William, the fun guy with animal features; Ellie, the cyclops barista who gives cute people freebies; and Trevor, a shy, anxious skeleton.

Befriend your neighbors, find self-confidence and your way in life, and even fall in love - both with your new home and with your desired.

Featuring four romanceable monsters both male and female, and four possible endings.

Full game will contain skippable H-scenes.

Art and Scenario: Kris
